reviews.title: Love it - great tool for my students!
reviews.comment: Please extend to include higher level dolch words - and a cursive writing option for the sight words would be very useful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very practical.  My niece actually will do this. Short and sweet. She can do a little or alot. The word variety is great for her need right now.
reviews.author: Lisa McIntire

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Nice to find a good free app with style and some effort put into it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but....
reviews.comment: Would love more words or sentences to practice on.
reviews.author: Brendan Hill

reviews.title: Doesnt provide feedback
reviews.comment: A feedback feature, or tracking feature would be helpful.
reviews.author: A Google User
